Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: erratic object changing course,and being chased by silent very high altitude crafts
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Shelbyville
There were no other sightings in Shelbyville on or around October 8th 2010
divs: sighting detailswas outside viewing the night sky ,and witnessed a blue white oval ball moving with no sound north to northwestern from a southerly direction,it immediately changed its direction to south again and then it stopped. i lost where it was, and i stayed outside pulled out my iphone and set it for video and i took pictures with it of the unidentified craft,and a few of the other crafts that were around it they had blue white and some had red strobing lights with no sound. i think they were in or close to being atmospheric in altitude,i noticed that they appeared to be trying to box in the glowing craft. i found it again after a few minutes it was moving from west to east in a jumping slow patern almost seemd it was curving alittle instead of a perfect lateral line across the sky when it finally went out of my range after a few minute there were 9 crafts in the area no sound or trails or anything we are close to airforce base located in tullahoma tennessee aprox 15 miles from our location the other craft i feel were military. what i recorded was sent to natn'l ufo reporting center\pics also. what i saw was not conventional or military that the other crafts were chasing,and or appeared to be chasing.i have seen other sightings like this one which is simular in shape and traveling the same way at other dates usually very fast one i saw moved from horizion to horizion in less than 30 secs. that was a few days before the one last night.
